name: christmas star ornament
notes:
type of instructions
- written instructions only
- no charts or photo tutorials.
- written using american standard crochet terms
- no tutorial or crochet lessons are included.

skill level
- advanced beginner/intermediate - no tutorial or crochet lessons are included.

finished size
- 3.5 inches approx - size will vary depending on the yarn and hook used.

yarn & hook
- any scrap yarn - i used malabrigo worsted
- 5mm crochet hook or a hook that corresponds to your yarn

languages
- english only with no charts.

terms of use
- for personal use only. do not copy, share or sell the pattern in part or whole. you may sell the finished item made using this pattern.

refund policy
- all digital sales are final.

about
truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns. this version on ravelry is a neat pdf version of my free pattern.
